    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private static void
    addWordsToTopic(String topic)
    Extension method for adding to a topic that prompts the user after the topic has successfully been inserted to add words right away, taking each line to be a word and ending once an empty line is read.
    private static void
    importFile()
    Prompts the user for a file to import, then parses it and adds all vocab terms to the list.

    Prompts the user to add a topic after an existing one.

    Prompts the user to add a topic before an existing one.

    The main method
    private static void

    Allows the user to select a topic to then add, remove, or modify a word from.
    private static void
    removeTopic()
    Prompts the user to remove an existing topic from the list.
    private static void
    searchLetters()
    Prompts the user for a letter and outputs all words through all vocab lists that start by that letter.
    private static void
    searchMethod()
    Allows the user to search for a word in the lists.
    (package private) static void
    showMainMenu()
    Display the main menu and prompts the user to make a choice among the other possible menus.
    private static void
    showTopics()
    Shows the list of topics, then prompts the user to select an index associated to a desired topic, then lists all items within that topic.
    private static void
    writeToFile()
    Prompts the user for a file path and writes the current vocab lists to it.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method
      Parameters:
      args - arguments i suppose

    • showMainMenu

      static void showMainMenu()
      Display the main menu and prompts the user to make a choice among the other possible menus.

    • showTopics

      private static void showTopics()
      Shows the list of topics, then prompts the user to select an index associated to a desired topic, then lists all items within that topic.

    • insertBefore

      private static void insertBefore()
      Prompts the user to add a topic before an existing one. If there are no topics currently listed, it creates a new one and assigns it as the head (and tail) of the dList.

    • insertAfter

      private static void insertAfter()
      Prompts the user to add a topic after an existing one. If there are no topics currently listed, it creates a new one and assigns it as the head (and tail) of the dList.

    • addWordsToTopic

      private static void addWordsToTopic(String topic)
      Extension method for adding to a topic that prompts the user after the topic has successfully been inserted to add words right away, taking each line to be a word and ending once an empty line is read.
      Parameters:
      topic - the topic to insert into.

    • removeTopic

      private static void removeTopic()
      Prompts the user to remove an existing topic from the list.

    • importFile

      private static void importFile()
      Prompts the user for a file to import, then parses it and adds all vocab terms to the list.

    • modifyTopic

      private static void modifyTopic()
      Allows the user to select a topic to then add, remove, or modify a word from.

    • searchMethod

      private static void searchMethod()
      Allows the user to search for a word in the lists.

    • searchLetters

      private static void searchLetters()
      Prompts the user for a letter and outputs all words through all vocab lists that start by that letter.

    • writeToFile

      private static void writeToFile()
      Prompts the user for a file path and writes the current vocab lists to it.
